definition: variant of 黄曆|黄历[huang2 li5]
(lit.) past years' almanac/(fig.) ancient history/obsolete practice/old-fashioned principle
to look to the past for guidance (idiom)
lit. almanac from years back (idiom)/obsolete practice/old-fashioned principle

sentences.english: So you thought you had no use for Latin in this modern age?
sentences.chinese: 這是什麼年頭，學拉丁文這些老皇曆是沒用的？

sentences.english: Last year's almanac is useless for this year.
sentences.chinese: 去年的皇曆，今年看不得。
